Injury: Selected by the Vegas Golden Knights from the Pittsburgh Penguins in the NHL Expansion Draft.
Missed the last 5 regular season and first 7 playoff games (concussion).
Signed by the Pittsburgh Penguins to a four-year contract extension.
Signed by the Pittsburgh Penguins to a seven-year contract extension.
Missed 27 games (ankle injury) and assigned to Wilkes-Barre/Scranton (AHL).
Re-signed as a restricted free agent by the Pittsburgh Penguins to a two-year contract.
Returned to his junior team (Cape Breton-QMJHL).
Recalled from the Canadian National Junior Team.
Assigned to the Canadian National Junior Team.
